name: Whale Captain
description:
Embark on your Dream Adventure: Discover uncharted lands, master the waves, and soar the skies!

Whale Captain is a challenging shoot-em-up bullet dodging game with a dash of side scrolling platformer:

• Crate smashing, power-ups, and coin collecting (x100 coins = x1 ♡).

• Six unique maps — Randomly ordered, each with two phases, and becoming progressively more difficult as the journey unfolds.

• Randomized enemy and obstacle generation system, no adventure is exactly the same.

• Mid-level intermissions in the form of bonus mini-games to collect more coins and make repairs, go for gold!

• Each map ends in a climactic Epic Multi-Phase Boss Battle.

• End-of-level loot to enhance the ship’s arsenal of abilities, with well over a dozen to discover.

• Progression is recorded at the end of each map (and also saved on Steam Cloud), but be warned — losing all your ♡ means beginning the journey anew.

Do you possess the unwavering resolve, relentless determination, and burning desire to be Whale Captain?

CONTROL AND DIFFICULTY OPTIONS


• Gamepad Support: Use the Left Trigger Button for more precision. Toggling the Thumbs Up Button in the settings panel adjusts the maximum sensitivity.

• Keyboard/Mouse Support: Use the Thumbs Up Button in the settings panel to select whether movement is an absolute distance from the cursor or relative to the cursor.

• Difficulty selection: Use the Clock Button in the settings panel to slow down time for a more leisurely and relaxed experience.
